entry.title: The Start
entry.content:
# Welcome to CascRoot

Greetings,

We are CascRoot, a dedicated CTF team from Algeria, forged at the Higher School of Computer Science and Technology in Amizour, Bejaia (ESTIN). With passion and precision, we tackle cybersecurity challenges head-on, always striving to raise the Algerian flag high in global competitions.

# Our Mission:

To push the boundaries of cybersecurity, overcome challenges with determination, and showcase our skills on the international stage.

# Our Slogan:

Breaking root while eating cascroot

  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub
  • OurTeam

Curious about our achievements? Check out our CTFtime profile for more details.

Let’s conquer the cybersecurity world together!
